TopicTitle: You won't redirect an asteroid today - Post Asteroid Redirect Fails Here!

Articles.Content:
You won't redirect an asteroid today - Post Asteroid Redirect Fails Here! Yes The Title Sounds Like the You will not go to space today one that's Only because I liked this title that I came up with...

So here's my fail:

I was burning for the rendezvous with the asteroid and then there was a glitch or something and the asteroid just disappeared even though it was tracked....

So I said that it was a fail.

My Fail:

Me:*Arms the Klaw*

Klaw:Okeey, i'm working.

Me:*spamming H and N key*

Asteroid:Good4You

Klaw:NOPE, I WON'T WORK. I WON'T ATTACH!

Me:

My Fail:

Me:*Arms the Klaw*

Klaw:Okeey, i'm working.

Me:*spamming H and N key*

Asteroid:Good4You

Klaw:NOPE, I WON'T WORK. I WON'T ATTACH!

Me: http://i2.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/original/000/259/943/694.png

lol that was hilarious

Glorious Tungstenistan! PRESENTS!:

Electric alternative, The future of the flight is shockingly awesome!

The Skanteri probe has been sent to the Asteroid class C "Valent"

Here we go! *20 Minutes later*

Damnit! it ran out of fuel! and it didn't even move that floating stone! Electric alternatives suck...

SEND THE PLAN B!

Maybe not so Glorious Tungstenistan! PRESENTS!:

You Know what?, Who cares about kerbin? We are going to die on a rocket explosion anyway! Lets launch our traditional dinosaur burner to space!

Here we go... Again. *7 minutes later*

Gah!... it happend again, but atleast its not going to impact kerbin but its reaaaaally inclined, this sucks...

Yep, Not so Glorious Tungstenistan! PRESENTS!:

Valent, the new pet of Kerbin!, too bad we left it at a very inclined position... We did our best...
